text: Simultaneous requirement of viroporins by SARS-CoV. In order to study the interdependence of SARS-CoV viroporins, all possible combinations of single-, double-, and triple-deletion mutants were engineered (Table 3 ). All combinations were efficiently rescued, with the remarkable exceptions of the triple mutant [rSARS-CoV-MA15-Δ(3a,E,8a)] and the one lacking both E and 3a proteins [rSARS-CoV-MA15-Δ(3a,E)]. The ΔE virus and double-deletion mutants Δ(3a,8a) and Δ(E,8a) showed significantly reduced titers (1 ϫ 10 6 , 2 ϫ 10 6 , and 6 ϫ 10 5 PFU/ml, respectively) compared to the Δ3a and Δ8a mutants and the parental virus.
